title: 怎么搞这类似传送带东西
author: SilentSkyShine
txt_content:
要求:粉红色带釉陶瓦  箭头朝那里， 就会向哪里缓慢移动
版本1.12 1.12 1.12 1.12 1.12！

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
execute @e ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta facing=north teleport @s ~ ~ ~-0.1
execute @e ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta facing=south teleport @s ~ ~ ~0.1
execute @e ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta facing=west teleport @s ~-0.1 ~ ~
execute @e ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta facing=east teleport @s ~0.1 ~ ~

可能方向反了，自行修改。

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
例子...
execute @a ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-0.1 ~ minecraft:stone 0 teleport @s ~0.1 ~ ~

replies.author: SilentSkyShine
replies.txt_content:
⊙v⊙ 发表于 2018-9-15 18:18
例子...
execute @a ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-0.1 ~ minecraft:stone 0 teleport @s ~0.1 ~ ~
不行，我改成陶瓦后不行 显示无法使XXX执行'detect'

replies.author: SilentSkyShine
replies.txt_content:
⊙v⊙ 发表于 2018-9-15 18:18

execute @a ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-0.1 ~ minecraft:stone 0 teleport @s ~0.1 ~ ~
execute @a ~ ~ ~ detect ~ ~-0.1 ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta 0 teleport @s ~0.01 ~ ~

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
后面的数据值竟然要改为-1...
另外，这方块竟然是用方块状态区分的...除非1.13，或改材质...或clone

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ruhuasiyu 于 2018-9-15 19:14 编辑 

 detect ~ ~-0.1  ~ minecraft:magenta_glazed_terracotta -1

实际上你需要根据不同的朝向对应的数据值来选择向哪边tp

这个....不知道行不行 tp x y z ~ ~ ~-0.001
接着超频，一定要超频！高频还是太慢了
如果感觉传送带卡的话可以适当增加0

replies.author: 26号猪肉
